response.summary:
I'm a Computer and Systems Engineer, passionate for technology and software
development using continuous self-learning as a tool to deliver the most value to
the client.
My principal experience is as Back-end developer, most specifically in Java EE
and Spring Framework (Spring Boot - REST) and AWS Serverless applications,
using SQL databases (MySQL, SQL Server, Oracle and Derby), and No SQL
databases, including integrations with Docker and several AWS tools.
In the Front-End I has worked with JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3, however, I
also have knowledge in JSP, JSF, AngularJS, Angular2+ and SAPUI 5
Frameworks.
I have been working under Agile methodologies, as Scrum, using Continuous
Integration and Continuous Delivery in conjunction with cloud tools like AWS.
response.skills: Java 8+, Dynamo, Game Development, Java, SQL, JavaScript, MongoDB, Spring Framework, Spring Boot, Maven, Tomcat, JBoss Application Server, MySQL, Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle Database, Derby, Git, Github, Gitlab, Bitbucket

profile_positions.description:
Since the beginning, I have been developing new abilities, by creating my own projects and doing some projects as a freelancer for some companies, with friends and colleagues, using courses and tech books to improve my knowledge, I am always programming and learning something.
I am pretty curious about the tech world, so I have been working with several languages like Java, C#, and C, several technologies, most of them related to web development, but also developing games, and even some Mobile apps, so I have a pretty good knowledge of the enterprise software lifecycle.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Working with a big US company related to the vehicles market, in a multicultural scrum team.
• Monitoring and enhancing important (business core) Java applications
and AWS Lambdas.
• Propose new ideas to make the system more reliable and efficient.
• Mentor new people and help them to understand all the systems under
our scope.
• Key technologies and tools: Java 8+, AWS, GitHub, Rally, Slack, Sumo
Logic, Launch Darkly, Terraform.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Develop REST APIs using spring boot and Java 8.
* Validate the code quality of other developers in the team, and ensure my own code quality, also with the review of my colleagues, and using sonar qube.
* Use the best practices to develop reusable and readable code.
* Test the developed functionalities before passing the user histories to the QA validation, solve bugs if there are any, as the result of the development, and help other colleagues to solve everyday blockings and bugs.
* Worked under the scrum framework with foreign clients, using the English language as the main language of communication, Rally, and Jira as the main tools to manage the sprint´s user stories.
* Communicate with the client directly every day to show the actual status of all the tasks.
* Collaborate with all the team to complete the tasks on time, and with the expected high quality.
* Stay relevant for the technological industry, doing courses on the latest technologies, and attending the different activities, and events that the company makes to enhance the professional's every aspect quality.
* Attend the mandatory English course, to enhance proficiency in the English language.
profile_positions.title: Senior Java Developer

profile_positions.description:
• Worked as a technical lead in one Scrum and LeSS Framework Team, collaborating with multiple teams to make two well-known bank's Integration possible.
• Use of multiple cutting-edge technologies, to develop new functionalities on a web platform, like Angular and Java with Spring Boot, and Jira to manage Scrum sprints.
• SDK development to integrate banking core services from DataPower to REST APIs services.
• Code review with the help of Git (Bitbucket) pull requests, and integration pipelines on Jenkins, unitary tests on the back-end and front-end with coverage analysis.
• Programing under code quality automatic validations using sonar and lint, and rigorous automatic security validations with fortify.
• APIs monitorization with New Relic, to validate and enhance endpoints performance and identify problems in real-time.
• Meetings for KPIs validation for every team, implementing measures to team and digital factory continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Work with agile Teams (Scrum) in SAP Labs Brasil directly, and then remotely, developing extensions (Web Apps) for different clients on the SAP Cloud.
* Interacting with colleagues in English, in written and spoken form.
* Develop of functionalities in front end and also in back-end.
* Back-end: Spring Framework use with Maven, developing micro services REST, with Integration Tests, code quality, and others. Using Tomcat and SQL database Derby (Similar to SAP Hanna DB).
* Front-End: Use of the SAPUI 5 Framework (JavaScript), with unitary and integration tests, code quality and others.
* Code versioning with Github, using Pull requests, to avoid manual code validation and changes approbation from the most experienced team members. Also using continuous integration pipelines on Jenkins, to execute multiple validation scrips.
* We use Jira to manage the User Stories, and Slack as the principal communication tool, to integrate also the Jenkins CI pipeline as another teammate, in case of error, to fast notification and correction.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Development of new components and enhancements over web applications implemented in Java (JEE), JSP, and Richfaces.
* The activities were developed for an important client related to the stock area.
* Use case generation for the client's compiled requirements.
* We use Weblogic as the applications server, and Oracle on the database.
* Analysis and correction of incidents in the applications, and use of  Scrum to enhance the workflow.
* Code re-factorization for multiple company web applications.
profile_positions.title: Technical Consultant

profile_positions.description:
* Applications support using JSF (Primefaces and Richfaces) with Java.
* Small web apps development in the JEE standard.
* Using JBoss 4, 7 and Wildfly.
* Querys generation , functions and scripts using a SQL Server Database.
* Use of agile methodologies, mostly Scrum, with periodical meetings to ensure the mutual collaboration between the team members, and fast incidents resolution using Mantis and Slack.
* Support and modification of ETLs.
profile_positions.title: Development and Support

profile_positions.description:
* Creation of multiple web applications for the company.
* Design and implementation of database models, using MySQL tools.
* Back-end development in Java, using Spring framework (Spring Boot) to generate REST API, and Tomcat as the applications server.
* Front-end development using AngularJS, HTML, Bootstrap, Javascript, Jquery, and CSS.
* Work in conjunction with another developer to test, front and back integration, and the generation of documentation.
* Administration and configuration of Tomcat, using the AWS services (EC2, Route 53, etc.)
* Periodic meetings to with company's CEO to review the project status and do enhancements.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer

profile_positions.description:
* Development of a web platform for an important environmental-related project.
* Creation of stored procedures in Oracle, using PL/SQL, also using Geo-Spatial data pre-processed from satellite images, and stored in the Oracle Database.
* Development of the Back-end using Java (JEE), and JBoss as the application's server.
* Working with two more developers, in different components, also making tests and documentation.
* Periodic meetings with the client to review the status of the project, enhancements, and changes.
profile_positions.title: Software Developer
